mapper.insert: insert into CONFIRMED (number, writer, footTraffic, confirmedDate, residence, detailRes) values (#{number}, #{writer}, #{footTraffic}, #{confirmedDate}, #{residence}, #{detailRes})
mapper.update: update CONFIRMED set number=#{number}, writer=#{writer}, footTraffic=#{footTraffic}, confirmedDate=#{confirmedDate}, residence=#{residence}, detailRes=#{detailRes} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from CONFIRMED order by id desc

select * from CONFIRMED where id like concat ('%', #{toFind}, '%') or writer like concat ('%', #{toFind}, '%') or footTraffic like concat ('%', #{toFind}, '%') or residence like concat ('%', #{toFind}, '%') or detailRes like concat ('%', #{toFind}, '%') order by id desc
